text: Nihsandehe yesaba loka kaphera, tara byaya kare nijedera dhana-sampada, yate kare badhadana karate pare allahara pathe. Bastutah ekhana tara aro byaya karabe. Tarapara ta'i tadera jan'ya aksepera karana haye ebam sesa paryanta tara here yabe. Ara yara kaphera taderake doyakhera dike tariye niye ya'oya habe.
